overview: The stylesheet defines a design system and layout utilities for a healthcare digital experience frontend. It establishes design tokens, responsive grid layouts, typography, accessibility helpers, and container spacing for consistent UI rendering across breakpoints.
key_components: Design tokens (:root variables for colors, typography, spacing, shadows, transitions)
interactions: Hover and focus-visible states for links and buttons
Skip-to-content focus reveal for keyboard navigation
Responsive layout adjustments via media queries
routes: No explicit routes defined; CSS applies globally across all frontend routes
data_flow: CSS variables cascade from :root to components
Media queries override base styles at breakpoints
Dark mode overrides applied via prefers-color-scheme media query
accessibility: High-contrast color tokens for dark mode
analytics: No analytics hooks defined in CSS; tracking expected at JS layer
test_ideas: Verify dark mode color tokens apply correctly when prefers-color-scheme=dark
Validate skip-to-content link becomes visible on keyboard focus
Check focus-visible outlines appear on tab navigation for interactive elements
Ensure responsive grid layouts adjust columns at 640px, 768px, and 1024px breakpoints
Confirm container padding scales correctly across breakpoints
Test hover and focus states for links and buttons for color contrast compliance
Validate visually-hidden elements remain accessible to screen readers
